Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension RxL Max® Chemistry System with Sample Transfer Module and the ADVIA® Modular Automation System
Dimension® RxL Max® Clinical Chemistry System with Sample Transfer Module and the ADVIA® Modular Automation System (LabCell®/WorkCell) with Calcium Reagents
Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension RxL Max Chemistry System with Sample Transfer Module and ADVIA Modular Automation System for photometric measurement of calcium and other chemistry analytes.
Indications for Use Summary: Discrete random access chemistry system measuring various analytes, including quantitative calcium assay in human serum or plasma for diagnosis and treatment of parathyroid, bone, renal diseases and tetany.
